channel.title: Most Tutorial Links
channel.description:
Press [b]Ctrl + F[/b] and type in what you're looking for to find it easily.
Organized by Category. Created = When they actually created it. Quoted = When they quoted it from a different website.
[b]-> Browser[/b]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,8728.0.html]How to Use Proxies in Firefox![/url] - Created by Ron [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,6763.0.html][Google] See Full Size Images in Firefox without going to a new site![/url] - Created by The Un-Named [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=6528.0]Using google to get serial keys and warez[/url] - Created by - hia - [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=4666.0]Firefox Extension Library[/url] - Created by Freddy1990 [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=2279.0]Mozilla Firefox vs Internet Explorer[/url] - Created by Ron [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=5672.0]Change The Window Name In I.E[/url] - Created by SamtheSam [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=5674.0]Five Reasons To Ditch I.E.[/url] - Quoted by SamtheSam [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=5913.0]How to Speed up Firefox[/url] - Quoted by sk84lifesam

item.title: Most Tutorial Links
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I wanted to write a SCAR script to check all the pages of the tutorial section and have it extract the links, titles, and authors, put it into an array, and output it in BBCode for an easy copy/paste topic.

Unfortunately, because of the TOS, I couldn’t. I kept trying to use POST variables to be able to view the mopar forums but it didn’t seem to work. If anyone does, show me the technique and I can have this page updated immediately.

Read full topic
